message: Hi Name,
We are pleased to send you this exclusive invitation to join us for our final Justia Webinars presentation of 2022!

Join senior members of our SEO team on Wednesday, December 7 at 2:00 pm ET (1:00 pm CT, 12:00 pm MT, 11 am PT) for a roundtable discussion on the Law Firm SEO in 2022, including ranking algorithm changes, changes to the search results pages, updates to Google Analytics, and more SEO news! As a bonus, we’re peering inside our crystal ball to let you know what we expect on the horizon in 2023.
This presentation is 100% free for all Justia Connect members – that means you! RSVP today to take advantage of this learning opportunity.

Dear Name,
As you plan your 2023 digital marketing strategies, why not take advantage of free SEO insights from the Justia Team?

As a Justia Connect member, you are eligible to join a roundtable discussion between Justia Sr. SEO Manager Ana Hidalgo, Justia Director of SEO Gustavo Montes, and Justia CEO Tim Stanley as they review the trends that shaped law firm SEO over the last year and talk about what is on the horizon for 2023.
The presentation will begin promptly at 2:00pm ET/11:00am PT on Wednesday, December 7 so mark your calendar and claim your seat today!

Hi Name,
We wanted to remind you to mark your calendar for your upcoming Justia Webinars presentation reviewing law firm SEO in 2022 and predicting what to expect in 2023!
You should have received an email from Zoom with your personalized access link for this webinar. If you have not already received this email from Zoom, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

message: Hi Name,

In just one week, Justia CEO Tim Stanley and SEO team leaders Ana Hidalgo and Gustavo Montes are leading an exclusive webinar for Justia Connect members covering 2022’s SEO developments while taking a look ahead to the trends that will continue to shape law firm SEO in the coming year.
note: Interested in learning more about what’s on the agenda? Check out the details in our new Justia Webinar Center.

message: Hi Name,

In just a few hours, you and other Justia Connect members will be joining members of Team Justia for a roundtable discussion on the SEO trends that shaped law firm SEO in 2022 with a look ahead to what is expected in 2023.

The presentation will begin promptly at 2:00 pm ET/11:00 am PT. You should have received your unique Zoon link for this webinar. If you cannot locate your link, please contact Justia Support immediately for assistance.
bottomline: Can’t make it anymore? Upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to unlock access to the recording.
